original_title: Chinese Communist Party official Yuan Jiajun to visit Sri Lanka
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Yuan Jiajun, a member of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, is set to visit Sri Lanka from July 19th to July 23rd.

The Chinese Embassy in Sri Lanka announced the visit through a Twitter message, stating that Yuan Jiajun will arrive in the country on the 19th of July. Yuan Jiajun also serves as the secretary of the Chongqing City Council in China, highlighting his prominent role in Chinese politics.
